meanings.definition: A type of fish known for its ability to inflate its body into a round shape as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent1: The globefishes puffed up to protect themselves from predators.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of globefishes swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The globefishes looked like little balloons floating in the water.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as round and puffy as globefishes when she smiled.
meanings.sent5: The globefishes expanded like tiny balloons, creating a mesmerizing sight.
